name: CT Market Stats: Overnight, IB & Close -- ES Futures
description:
LOAD ES-Futures 1Min continuous contract via Polygon
COMPUTE session windows for RTH (09:30-16:00), ETH overnight (18:00-09:30), and IB (09:30-10:30)
CALCULATE overnight high/low/mid and volume profile (VPOC, VAH, VAL) touch rates during RTH
CALCULATE IB break probabilities: single/both/neither, within prior IB, opens-in-prior-IB breakout rates
CALCULATE close location after single IB break (above IBH, above MID, below IBL, below MID)
CALCULATE close stats: bearish/bullish engulfing, closes within IB on neutral day, within prior IB/range
DASHBOARD shows four summary tables: Overnight Session Levels, Initial Balance, Close After Single IB Break, Close

name: CT Market Stats: Auction & Opening Location -- ES Futures
description:
LOAD ES-Futures 1Min continuous contract via Polygon with RTH and IB session windows
COMPUTE 20-session harmonic rotations using zigzag swing detection (swing_length=2)
CALCULATE neutral day rate (both IB extremes broken), consecutive neutral day probability, and neutral extreme day rate
CALCULATE opening location rates: opens above/below pClose, above pHOD, below pLOD, within pIB, within pValue
DASHBOARD shows Auction summary table, Opening Location summary table, and Up/Down rotation histograms

name: CT Market Stats: Open vs Previous Range -- ES Futures
description:
LOAD ES-Futures 1Min continuous contract with RTH volume profile (VPOC, VAH, VAL)
CLASSIFY each session open as above, within, or below previous day RTH range
CALCULATE touch probabilities for 11 prior-session levels (pClose, pHOD, pLOD, pIBH, pIBL, pMID, pOpen, pVAH, pVAL, pVPOC, half-gap)
CONDITION touch rates on opening classification (above/within/below previous range)
DASHBOARD shows three summary tables: Opens Above, Opens Within, and Opens Below Previous Range with per-level touch rates

name: CT Market Stats: Volume & Range Distributions -- ES Futures
description:
LOAD ES-Futures 1Min continuous contract with RTH, ETH, and IB session windows aggregating volume
CALCULATE session-level volume (RTH and ETH) and range (RTH, ETH, IB) per day
COMPUTE mean, median, and standard deviation for each range distribution
DASHBOARD shows sample/range statistics cards, RTH and ETH volume histograms, RTH and ETH range histograms, and IB range histogram

name: CT IB & Close Analysis
description:
LOAD SPY-Stocks 5Min bars as ES futures proxy with RTH and 30-min IB session windows
CALCULATE IB break probabilities: at-least-one, both, neither, only-IBH, only-IBL, IB-within-prior-IB
CALCULATE conditional close location after single IBH or IBL break (closes above/below IBH/IBL/MID)
CALCULATE close stats: bearish/bullish engulfing, closes within IB on neutral day, within prior IB/range
DASHBOARD shows overview cards, IB Break Probabilities table, Close After Single IB Break table, and Close Statistics table

name: CT Opening & Level Touch
description:
LOAD SPY-Stocks 5Min bars with RTH, 30-min IB, and pre-market (04:00-09:30) session windows plus volume profile
CALCULATE opening location rates: above/below pClose, above pHOD, below pLOD, within pIB, within pValue
CLASSIFY opens as above/within/below prior range and compute conditional touch rates for 10+ prior levels
CALCULATE overnight session level touch rates: ONH, ONL, ONMID, ONVAH, ONVAL, ONVPOC
DASHBOARD shows Opening Location table, three conditional touch-rate tables (Above/Within/Below), and Overnight Level touch table

name: CT Session Structure
description:
LOAD SPY-Stocks 5Min extended-hours bars with RTH, pre-market, and IB session windows
COMPUTE harmonic rotations via zigzag swing detection: up/down rotation sizes, counts per session, session efficiency
CALCULATE auction day type: neutral day rate, neutral-follows-neutral probability, neutral extreme day rate
CALCULATE RTH and pre-market volume/range distributions plus IB range distributions
DASHBOARD shows summary cards, rotation histograms (up/down/efficiency/count), auction cards, volume histograms and stats, range histograms with boxplot comparison

name: Commodity Correlations (12M Weekly Returns)
description:
LOAD 20 commodity price series from FRED (metals, energy, grains, softs, meats, lumber) plus USD Index and SPY
COMPUTE weekly returns for all assets on a 1W timeframe
CALCULATE 52-week rolling Pearson correlations of each commodity to USD Index and to S&P 500
GENERATE 20-week rolling USD-Lumber correlation time series chart
DASHBOARD shows a labeled scatter plot with all 20 commodities positioned by USD correlation (X) vs S&P 500 correlation (Y)

name: Currency-Commodity Correlations Analysis
description:
LOAD FX pair (AUDUSD/USDCAD/USDCHF/USDJPY) daily data plus Gold (GLD), Oil (WTI), Iron Ore, and Silver reference series
CALCULATE 20-day rolling Pearson correlations between the FX pair and each commodity
VALIDATE reported correlations (e.g., AUDUSD/Gold ~0.80, CAD/Oil ~-0.87) against computed values
DASHBOARD shows four time-series charts (Gold, Oil, Iron Ore, Silver rolling correlations) with reference lines at reported values, plus summary cards with mean/min/max correlation stats

name: Stock-Bond Correlation Regime Shifts
description:
LOAD SPY weekly returns and TLT (long-term Treasury) weekly returns via Polygon
CALCULATE 1-year, 2-year, and 3-year rolling Pearson stock-bond correlations
COMPUTE CPI and Industrial Production year-over-year changes, 2-year rolling volatility, and growth-inflation correlation
CLASSIFY macroeconomic regimes (growth up/down, inflation up/down) using expanding median thresholds
DASHBOARD shows SBC regime shift time series, inflation/growth uncertainty chart, growth-inflation correlation chart, and average stock/bond returns by growth and inflation regime bar charts

name: ES Futures Continuation Analysis
description:
LOAD ES-Futures daily OHLCV from Polygon
BUILD continuous contracts for 4 adjustment methods (BackwardPanama, BackwardRatio, ForwardPanama, ForwardRatio) x 3 rollover strategies (FirstOfMonth, LastTradingDay, LiquidityBased)
COMPUTE daily returns (roc), cumulative product returns, and 21-day rolling volatility (stddev) for each combination
PLOT overlaid cumulative return curves for adjustment methods and rollover methods
SCATTER daily returns of each method vs BackwardPanama baseline to assess correlation
SHOW return distribution histograms (50 bins) per adjustment method and per rollover method

name: ES Futures NFP Intraday Reaction
description:
LOAD ES-Futures 5Min bars with NoAdjustment continuous contract (LastTradingDay roll)
DETECT NFP release days using PAYEMS economic indicator via ffill_day + Friday filter
DEFINE session windows around 8:30 AM ET: pre (7:30-8:30), immediate (8:30-8:35), short (8:35-9:00), 1hr post, RTH, and full day
COMPUTE window returns and ranges for all days and NFP-Friday-only days using where() filters
PLOT average return and range bar charts comparing NFP Fridays vs all-day baselines
SHOW NFP return/range distributions, day-of-week breakdowns, cumulative window equity curves, and summary statistics table

name: EUR/USD Post-NFP Reaction Analysis
description:
LOAD EUR/USD 5Min spot FX data from Polygon
DEFINE session windows around 8:30 AM ET: pre (8:00-8:30), immediate (8:30-8:35), narrow (8:35-9:00), hourly (9:00-9:30), full 2hr (8:30-10:30)
COMPUTE window returns and true range (high-low)/open for each window on all trading days
PLOT average return and range comparison bar charts across windows
BREAK DOWN immediate and narrow returns by day of week
SHOW cumulative return equity curves per window, return and range histograms, and summary statistics table (mean, stddev, range)

name: EUR/USD NFP Volatility Decay Analysis
description:
LOAD EUR/USD 5Min bars and detect NFP Fridays via PAYEMS economic indicator + Friday filter
DEFINE twelve consecutive 5-minute session windows from 8:30 to 9:30 AM ET (60 minutes total)
COMPUTE range volatility in basis points ((high-low)/open * 10000) for each 5-minute bucket
FILTER to NFP Friday observations only using where() conditional
SHOW summary table replicating Rezania (2010) Table 7 with mean range per 5-minute interval
MODEL expected exponential decay: sigma(t) = sigma_0 * exp(-alpha * t), target alpha = 0.049

name: EUR/USD NFP Volatility Figure 1 Replication
description:
LOAD EUR/USD 1-minute bars and detect NFP Fridays via PAYEMS + day_of_week filter
DEFINE 6-hour analysis window (5:30-11:30 AM ET, 360 minutes, NFP release at minute 180)
COMPUTE per-minute range volatility in basis points for each bar
PLOT multi-line chart with one line per NFP release day (split_by_label on date) showing minute-by-minute range
SHOW aggregated mean range bar chart per minute bucket for NFP Fridays vs other Fridays (control)
DISPLAY summary cards comparing NFP vs non-NFP Friday mean/max range and sample counts

name: FC Multi-Timeframe Cloning Test
description:
LOAD ES-Futures with futures_continuation at global 1D timeframe (FirstOfMonth, BackwardPanamaCanal)
ADD a second market_data_source at 5Min timeframe to introduce multi-timeframe scenario
COMPUTE 20-period SMA on both daily and 5Min close prices
VERIFY compiler auto-clones the futures_continuation node to the 5Min timeframe
SHOW daily SMA and 5Min SMA as hero cards in separate dashboard categories

name: IB 20-Session Analysis
description:
LOAD SPY 5Min bars with volume profile (78-bar window) and equity RTH session windows
COMPUTE Initial Balance (9:30-10:00 ET) high/low/width, IB breakout flags, extension ratios, and Dalton 6-type day classification
CALCULATE rolling 20-session statistics: IB width z-score, percentile rank, breakout rates, and average extensions
CLASSIFY sessions as Narrow IB (<=30th pctile) vs Wide IB (>=70th pctile) and compare ranges, extensions, and day types
PLOT IB width trends with 20-session average, cumulative breakout rates, z-score over time, and narrow vs wide day type distributions
SHOW summary tables (last session vs 20-session avg), boxplots, histograms, extension targets, prior VA context, and event markers for narrow/wide/both-broken days

name: NASDAQ IB Low Break + Prior Day Low Reversal Probability
description:
LOAD QQQ 5Min bars with Initial Balance (9:30-10:30 ET) session window and prior day high/low levels
DETECT trigger days where session low broke both IB low and prior day's low (EOD evaluation)
COMPUTE win rate: probability of session close finishing above IB midpoint on triggered days
TRACK cumulative win rate over time and cumulative return from IB low to close on triggered days
PLOT probability trend, return distributions, extension below IB/prior-day-low histograms, and win rate by day-of-week/month
SHOW summary cards (win rate, trigger count, best/worst return), IB reference levels chart, and win/loss event markers

name: Quarterly OPEX Momentum Reversal
description:
LOAD SPY daily bars and detect quarterly OPEX dates (3rd Friday of Mar/Jun/Sep/Dec) using is_period_boundary
COMPUTE 10-day rate of change as momentum signal; enter long if momentum < 0 or short if > 0 on OPEX Monday
HOLD positions with hold_until() and exit 10 trading days after OPEX Friday
CALCULATE strategy daily returns, cumulative equity curve, and active-only return series
PLOT cumulative P&L, return distribution histogram, total/avg return by quarter, quarterly heatmap, and boxplots by quarter/year
SHOW summary cards (cumulative return, trade counts, long/short entries) and event markers for long and short entries

name: FX Monthly Seasonality Analysis
description:
LOAD USD/CAD and USD/JPY daily and monthly bars from Polygon
COMPUTE daily and monthly returns, win/loss flags (positive vs negative months), and absolute monthly returns
GROUP by calendar month using datetime_extract for seasonality breakdowns
PLOT monthly returns heatmap (month x year), average return by month bar chart, and win rate by month
SHOW summary tables: monthly return stats (avg, median, best, worst), win/loss rates per month, and absolute return stats
VALIDATE Investopedia claims: USD/CAD Oct/Nov 63% win rate, USD/JPY Oct 68% win rate

name: EUR/USD Monthly Seasonality Analysis
description:
LOAD EUR/USD daily, monthly, and yearly bars from Polygon
COMPUTE daily, monthly, and yearly returns plus win/loss indicators and cumulative return series
EXTRACT best/worst return dates using arg_max/arg_min on monthly timeframe
PLOT monthly returns heatmap (month x year), average return by calendar month, yearly return bar chart, and day-of-week breakdown
SHOW summary tables: monthly return stats (avg, median, best, worst), win/loss rates, and absolute returns grouped by month
DISPLAY summary cards (best/worst return with dates, win rate, counts) and cumulative return equity curve

name: S&P 500 Worst Performers Analysis
description:
LOAD daily bars for all S&P 500 stocks via polygon
COMPUTE 1-week return (5-day ROC), 50-day SMA, 52-week high, and all-time high for each stock
CALCULATE days since 52-week high and days since all-time high using barssince
FILTER to bottom 20 stocks ranked by worst 1-week return
DASHBOARD shows boxplot of return distribution across all S&P 500, plus ranked table of 20 worst performers with SMA position and high-distance metrics

name: S&P 500 Opening Range Breakout Analysis
description:
LOAD 1-minute SPX index bars via polygon over 2 years
DEFINE opening range as 09:30-09:45 ET high/low, detect upside and downside breakouts after OR completes
CLASSIFY each day as up-only, down-only, both-sides, or no-breakout; track which direction broke first
COMPUTE OR width, breakout extensions (points and multiples of OR), close position relative to OR, and failed breakout rates
CUMULATE pattern counts over time for trend analysis
DASHBOARD shows hero cards with breakout/close statistics, summary table, cumulative trend lines, OR width histogram, extension boxplots, and both-sides-break gauge

name: SPY Morning Dip Mean Reversion
description:
LOAD 5-minute SPY bars via polygon over the past year
IDENTIFY morning dip: price at 09:45 ET is below the RTH open
COMPUTE session return from 09:45 entry to 10:30 exit when trigger fires, track wins/losses
CUMULATE compounded returns across triggered days to build equity curve
DASHBOARD shows summary cards (final return, win/loss counts, avg/best/worst return), event markers for winning and losing trades, cumulative return line chart, and return distribution histogram

name: SPY Morning Dip - Window Optimization
description:
LOAD 5-minute SPY bars and define 20 entry/exit session windows across 4 entries (9:40-9:55) and 5 exits (10:00-11:00)
COMPUTE triggered returns for each window (buy when price below RTH open) and cumulative compounded equity curves
AGGREGATE average returns per window for side-by-side bar chart comparison
ANALYZE day-of-week effect on the baseline 9:45-10:30 window
DASHBOARD shows 20-window average return bar chart, day-of-week bars, cumulative return cards by entry time, and equity curve overlay for 9:45 entry variants

name: TradingView-Style Technical Analysis - SLV
description:
LOAD daily bars for SLV (Silver ETF) via polygon
COMPUTE 9 oscillators (RSI, Stochastic, CCI, ADX, AO, Momentum, MACD, Williams %R, Ultimate) and classify each as Buy/Sell/Neutral
COMPUTE 15 moving averages (SMA/EMA at 10-200, HMA, VWMA, Ichimoku) and classify price position vs each
CALCULATE aggregate scores on 0-100 gauge scale for oscillators, MAs, and combined summary
DERIVE Classic, Fibonacci, Camarilla, and Woodie pivot points from prior session
DASHBOARD shows three summary gauges, signal count table, oscillator detail table, MA detail table, and 4-method pivot points table

name: Multi-Timeframe Volume Profile Confluence
description:
LOAD 5-minute SPY bars and compute volume profiles across 3 tiers: 1-day (78 bars), 5-day (390 bars), and extended (500 bars)
EXTRACT POC, VAH, VAL per tier plus VWAP, prior close, and prior high/low as reference levels
DETECT confluence zones where levels from different timeframes cluster within 0.3% of anchor levels (POC 1D, POC 5D, VWAP, Prior Close)
GRADE zone strength on 8-point scale checking prior levels, composite alignment, VPOC presence, volume confirmation, and level hold behavior
TRACK historical test rates and outcomes (support vs resistance) for prior VPOC, VAH, VAL
DASHBOARD shows multi-TF overview cards, level tables, confluence/zone score cards, grading breakdown, historical test rates, timeseries overlays, and distribution histograms with event markers for high-conviction zones

name: Multi-Session Volume Profile Analysis
description:
LOAD 5-minute SPY bars and compute session (78-bar) and 5-day composite (390-bar) volume profiles
BUILD 5-session lag chain (T-0 through T-4) tracking VPOC, VAH, VAL, VA width, close position, and profile shape per session
COMPUTE VA overlap percentages between adjacent sessions, VPOC migration deltas, and VA midpoint shift streaks
CLASSIFY market regime as Balance (>70% overlap), Migrating Up/Down (3+ streak, <60% overlap), or Neutral
DETECT Axia Futures price-value divergence (new high/low without VA following) and naked VPOCs (untouched prior session VPOCs)
DASHBOARD shows 5-session migration table, regime detection cards with overlap/streak timeseries, divergence counts with event markers, composite profile comparison, and naked VPOC cluster alerts

name: Volume Profile Session Analysis
description:
LOAD 5-minute SPY bars and compute per-session volume profile (VPOC, VAH, VAL) with 78-bar rolling window
CALCULATE Initial Balance (first 30 min), IB extension ratios, close percentile, volume conviction ratio, and VWAP
CLASSIFY Dalton day types (Normal, Trend, Double Distribution, Neutral, Normal Variation), profile shapes (P/b/D/B/Elongated), and opening types (Drive, Test-Drive, Reject-Reverse, Auction)
ANALYZE excess/tails for poor highs/lows (magnets), gap behavior, VPOC migration vs prior session, and intraday VA shift from mid-session
DASHBOARD shows session overview cards, key levels table, close/extension analysis, day type and shape bar charts, auction quality table, distribution histograms and boxplots, with event markers for trend days, poor highs/lows, open-drives, and rejection-reversals

name: VPOC Tracking & Naked VPOC Analysis
description:
LOAD 5-minute SPY bars and extract VPOCs from 10 prior sessions using valuewhen(occurrence=N)
TRACK VPOC migration direction, consecutive streak length, net migration, and trending flag across 10 sessions
DETECT naked (untested) VPOCs from 9 prior sessions using rolling min/max over N*78-bar windows, compute distances and prominence scores
CLASSIFY prior-session VPOC test behavior as bounce (defended) vs break (accepted) based on approach direction and close position
COMPUTE cumulative bounce/break rates and high-priority naked VPOC count (within 1% of close)
DASHBOARD shows migration cards and table, naked VPOC summary with 5-session detail table, test behavior cards with outcome bar chart, and event markers for nearby naked VPOCs, bounces, breaks, and migration streaks

name: VWAP-VPOC Convergence Analysis
description:
LOAD 5-minute SPY bars and compute session VWAP and VPOC (78-bar volume profile) each day
CALCULATE VWAP-VPOC delta in points and percentage, classify as convergence (<=0.2%), intermediate, or decision zone (>0.5%)
BUILD 5-session rolling history of VWAP, VPOC, and delta; detect trajectory patterns (converging, diverging, parallel)
CLASSIFY close position relative to both anchors (above both, below both, between) and track VPOC-above-VWAP consistency
COMPUTE anchor reference levels (100-day high, 20-day swing low, month-start close, 20-day VWMA) for broader context
DASHBOARD shows convergence overview cards, delta timeseries, VWAP vs VPOC scatter plots, 5-session history table, trajectory/close distribution bars, close distance histograms, delta boxplots, anchor levels table, and event markers for convergence and divergence zones

name: AAPL Post-Earnings Drift by EPS Surprise Magnitude
description:
LOAD AAPL daily bars and quarterly earnings data via earnings(period=EarningsPeriod.quarterly)
CLASSIFY events into Beat (>5% surprise), Miss (<-5% surprise), and Neutral regimes
COMPUTE normalized return paths from T-10 to T+60 relative to pre-event close
CALCULATE window-specific returns (pre-10d, pre-5d, earnings day, post-5d through post-60d)
DASHBOARD shows overview cards, cumulative earnings-day returns by regime, composite return path bars, post-60d return distributions, and event markers with EPS surprise details

name: CPI Release Impact on Treasury Bonds (TLT)
description:
LOAD TLT daily bars and CPI economic indicator via common_economic_indicators(category=MacroEconomicsIndicator.CPI)
DETECT CPI acceleration using valuewhen to compare current vs prior CPI change
CLASSIFY events as Hot CPI (accelerating inflation) vs Cool CPI (decelerating inflation)
COMPUTE normalized return paths from T-5 to T+20 relative to pre-event close
DASHBOARD shows overview cards, cumulative CPI-day returns by regime, composite return path bars, post-20d return distributions, and event markers with CPI change details

name: Fed Rate Decision Impact on SPY
description:
LOAD SPY daily bars and Fed Funds rate via common_economic_indicators(category=MacroEconomicsIndicator.FedFunds)
CLASSIFY rate decisions as Hike (>=20bps), Cut (<=-20bps), or Hold using valuewhen for prior rate comparison
COMPUTE normalized return paths from T-5 to T+30 relative to pre-event close
CALCULATE window-specific returns (pre-5d, pre-3d, fed day, post-3d through post-30d)
DASHBOARD shows overview cards, cumulative fed-day returns by regime, composite return path bars, post-30d return distributions, and event markers with rate change details

name: AAPL Analyst Rating Upgrade vs Downgrade Drift
description:
LOAD AAPL daily bars and analyst ratings via analyst_ratings()
CLASSIFY events as Upgrade (price target raised) vs Downgrade (price target lowered)
COMPUTE normalized return paths from T-10 to T+30 relative to pre-event close
CALCULATE window-specific returns (pre-10d, pre-5d, rating day, post-5d through post-30d)
DASHBOARD shows overview cards, cumulative rating-day returns by direction, composite return path bars, post-30d and rating-day return distributions, and event markers with price target change details

name: NFP Release Impact on Gold Futures (GC)
description:
LOAD GC-Futures daily bars and NFP economic indicator via common_economic_indicators(category=MacroEconomicsIndicator.NonfarmPayrolls)
DETECT NFP release dates and compute month-over-month change using valuewhen
CLASSIFY events as Strong NFP (>200K change, bearish gold) vs Weak NFP (<100K change, bullish gold)
COMPUTE normalized return paths from T-5 to T+20 relative to pre-event close
DASHBOARD shows overview cards, cumulative NFP-day returns by regime, composite return path bars, post-20d return distributions, and event markers with NFP change details

name: SPY Dividend Ex-Date Price Drop Analysis
description:
LOAD SPY daily bars and dividend data via dividends(dividend_type=DividendType.CD)
COMPUTE dividend yield relative to close and classify as High Yield (>0.4%) vs Low Yield (<=0.4%)
CALCULATE expected vs actual price drop and drop ratio on ex-date
COMPUTE normalized return paths from T-5 to T+10 relative to pre-event close
DASHBOARD shows overview cards, cumulative ex-date returns by yield regime, composite return path bars, post-10d and drop ratio distributions, and event markers with yield details

name: Yield Curve Inversion Impact on SPY
description:
LOAD SPY daily bars and Treasury yields (10Y and 2Y) via common_economic_indicators
DETECT yield curve inversion (2Y > 10Y) and un-inversion (2Y crosses back below 10Y) events
COMPUTE normalized return paths from T-60 to T+252 relative to pre-event close
DASHBOARD shows overview cards, cumulative event-day returns, composite return path bars, post-252d return distributions, and event markers with spread details

name: ISM Manufacturing PMI Impact on SPY
description:
LOAD SPY daily bars and ISM Manufacturing PMI via common_economic_indicators
CLASSIFY events as Improving (current > prior reading) vs Deteriorating (current < prior) using valuewhen
COMPUTE normalized return paths from T-5 to T+20 relative to pre-event close
DASHBOARD shows overview cards, cumulative PMI-day returns by regime, composite return path bars, post-20d return distributions, and event markers with PMI change details

name: CPI Release Impact on EUR/USD
description:
LOAD EUR/USD (^EURUSD-FX) daily bars and CPI economic indicator via common_economic_indicators
DETECT CPI acceleration using valuewhen to compare current vs prior CPI change
CLASSIFY events as Hot CPI (accelerating) vs Cool CPI (decelerating)
COMPUTE normalized return paths from T-5 to T+20 relative to pre-event close
DASHBOARD shows overview cards, cumulative CPI-day returns by regime, composite return path bars, and event markers

name: TSLA Short Volume Spike Signal
description:
LOAD TSLA daily bars and short volume data via short_volume()
DETECT short volume spikes using ratio > 1.15x threshold of recent average
CLASSIFY events as Bullish Signal (spike followed by up move) vs Bearish Signal
COMPUTE normalized return paths from T-5 to T+20 relative to pre-event close
DASHBOARD shows overview cards, cumulative returns by signal type, composite return paths, and event markers with short volume ratio details

name: CPI Release Intraday Impact on Treasury Futures (ZB)
description:
LOAD TLT 5Min bars and CPI economic indicator for intraday event study around 8:30 AM ET
DETECT CPI release days and classify as Hot CPI vs Cool CPI using valuewhen comparison
DEFINE session windows: pre (7:30-8:30), immediate (8:30-8:35), short (8:35-9:00), and post windows
COMPUTE window returns and range for CPI days only
DASHBOARD shows summary cards, window return comparisons, and intraday reaction charts

name: NFP Release Intraday Impact on Gold Futures (GC)
description:
LOAD GC-Futures 5Min bars via futures_continuation and NFP economic indicator
DETECT NFP release dates and classify as Strong (>200K) vs Weak (<100K) using valuewhen
DEFINE session windows around 8:30 AM ET: pre, immediate, short, and post windows
COMPUTE window returns for NFP days only
DASHBOARD shows summary cards, intraday reaction comparison bars, and window return analysis

name: ISM Manufacturing PMI Intraday Impact on SPY
description:
LOAD SPY 5Min bars and ISM Manufacturing PMI for intraday event study around 10:00 AM ET
DETECT ISM release days and classify as Improving vs Deteriorating using valuewhen comparison
DEFINE session windows around 10:00 AM ET: pre, immediate, short, and post windows
COMPUTE window returns for ISM days only
DASHBOARD shows summary cards, window return comparisons, and intraday reaction charts

name: CPI Release Intraday Impact on EUR/USD
description:
LOAD EUR/USD (^EURUSD-FX) 5Min bars and CPI economic indicator
DETECT CPI release days and classify as Hot CPI vs Cool CPI around 8:30 AM ET
DEFINE session windows: pre, immediate, short, and post windows
COMPUTE window returns for CPI days only
DASHBOARD shows summary cards, intraday FX reaction comparisons, and window return analysis

name: AAPL Earnings + Analyst Rating Double Event
description:
LOAD AAPL daily bars, quarterly earnings, and analyst ratings
DETECT concordance: earnings beat/miss within 30 bars of analyst upgrade/downgrade
CLASSIFY as Positive Concordant (beat+upgrade), Negative Concordant (miss+downgrade), or Discordant
COMPUTE normalized return paths from T-10 to T+30 for each concordance regime
DASHBOARD shows event census cards, cumulative returns, composite return paths, and concordance analysis

name: CPI + Fed Funds Double Event on Bonds (TLT)
description:
LOAD TLT daily bars, CPI indicator, and Fed Funds rate
DETECT double macro events: CPI release within 30 bars of Fed rate change
CLASSIFY as Hot+Hike, Cool+Cut, or Mixed regime
COMPUTE normalized return paths from T-5 to T+20 for each double-event regime
DASHBOARD shows event census, cumulative returns, composite return paths, and regime comparison

name: NVDA Earnings Surprise vs Post-Earnings Volatility
description:
LOAD NVDA daily bars and quarterly earnings data
CLASSIFY earnings events as Beat (>5% surprise) or Miss and compute pre-event volatility change
CALCULATE average volatility change around earnings using stddev of returns
COMPUTE normalized return paths from T-10 to T+30 relative to pre-event close
DASHBOARD shows event overview cards, cumulative returns, composite return paths, volatility metrics, and event markers

name: Initial Claims Spike + Yield Curve Regime on SPY
description:
LOAD SPY daily bars, initial jobless claims, and yield curve spread (10Y-2Y)
DETECT claims spikes and condition on yield curve state (inverted vs normal)
CLASSIFY as Spike+Inverted, Spike+Normal, or No Spike regime
COMPUTE normalized return paths from T-5 to T+20 for each double-condition regime
DASHBOARD shows event census, cumulative returns, composite return paths, and regime comparison

name: TSLA Short Interest + Earnings Short Squeeze Setup
description:
LOAD TSLA daily bars, short interest data, and quarterly earnings
CLASSIFY short interest as High (above median) or Low and combine with earnings beat/miss
CREATE regimes: High SI + Beat, High SI + Miss, Low SI + Beat, Low SI + Miss
COMPUTE normalized return paths from T-10 to T+30 for each combined regime
DASHBOARD shows event census, cumulative returns, composite return paths, and event markers

name: AAPL Gross Margin Expansion/Contraction Drift
description:
LOAD AAPL daily bars and quarterly income statement data
COMPUTE gross margin (gross_profit/revenue) and detect margin expansion vs contraction using valuewhen
CLASSIFY as Margin Expansion or Margin Contraction regime
COMPUTE normalized return paths from T-10 to T+30 relative to pre-event close
DASHBOARD shows event census, cumulative returns, composite return paths, margin trend charts, and event markers

name: NVDA Earnings: Revenue Acceleration Event Study
description:
LOAD NVDA daily bars and quarterly earnings data via earnings(period=EarningsPeriod.quarterly)
COMPUTE YoY revenue growth and detect acceleration (current > prior quarter) using valuewhen
CLASSIFY events as Accelerating or Decelerating revenue growth regime
COMPUTE normalized return paths from T-30 to T+30 relative to pre-event close
DASHBOARD shows overview cards, cumulative earnings-day returns by regime, composite return path bars, distributions, and event markers with revenue growth details

name: AAPL Valuation Multiples: 5Y History & Large-Cap Tech Peer Comparison
description:
LOAD daily bars for 6 large-cap tech stocks (AAPL, MSFT, GOOGL, AMZN, META, NVDA)
COMPUTE P/E, P/S, EV/EBITDA, P/B via finance_ratio plus gross/operating/net margins
CALCULATE rolling 5-year z-scores and margin-adjusted P/E for relative value assessment
DASHBOARD shows cross-sectional summary tables, valuation bar charts by asset, margin comparisons, z-score bars, and time-series overlays for all metrics using cs_* reporters

name: MSFT Return Decomposition: Earnings Growth, Multiple Expansion & Rate Sensitivity
description:
LOAD MSFT daily bars, TTM income statement, and FRED 10Y TIPS real yield (DFII10)
COMPUTE daily log returns decomposed into earnings growth, rate-driven multiple change, and residual sentiment
CALCULATE rolling 60-day beta and correlation to real yield changes
DASHBOARD shows cumulative return attribution (stacked area), total vs component returns, scatter plot of returns vs yield changes, rolling beta/correlation, P/E and EPS context charts

name: AMZN Downside Scenario: +100bp Real Rate Rise & Flat Forward Earnings
description:
LOAD AMZN daily bars, TTM fundamentals (income, balance sheet, cash flow), and 10Y Treasury yield
COMPUTE 3 scenario fair values using justified P/E multipliers (Base 33.3x, Downside 11.3x, Severe 10.9x) applied to TTM EPS
CALCULATE premium/discount to each fair value, EPS/revenue YoY growth, FCF yield, and P/E by rate regime
DASHBOARD shows scenario overview cards, price vs fair value charts, P/E with reference lines, rate regime histograms, yield comparisons, and fundamental trend charts

name: TSLA: Sentiment Proxy vs Fundamental Deterioration
description:
LOAD TSLA daily bars, analyst ratings, quarterly earnings, and income statement
DETECT sentiment events (analyst downgrades) and fundamental events (earnings miss, margin contraction, revenue deceleration)
CLASSIFY concordance: pure sentiment (downgrade without recent fundamental) vs concordant (downgrade near fundamental event)
COMPUTE normalized return paths from T-10 to T+30 for each event type
DASHBOARD shows event census, sentiment vs fundamental return paths, persistence analysis, concordance comparison, cumulative returns, and event markers
